welcome.title: Welcome to ArisanBae !
welcome.description: Applications to help those of you who are complicated to take notes about social gathering. Create a member and do the lottery anywhere.
welcome.footer_caption: Insya Allah This social gathering application has followed the allowed rules, please read more

create_profile_admin.description: Complete your arisan data below, OK.
create_profile_admin.error_input_one: Enter the name of the gathering
create_profile_admin.error_input_five: Enter the number of people participating
create_profile_admin.error_input_six: Unable to calculate the winner, please enter the correct winner

entry_member.title: Member Content
entry_member.description: Please fill in the member according to the number of members that have been determined at the beginning.

create_pin_admin.title: Create Pin
create_pin_admin.description: Create a pin to enter into the application later.

confirm.title: Do you want to draw the winner of this social gathering
